Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the contents of a lobbyist’s statement of registration, and to repeal subdivision (g) of section 3-213 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to the mailing of forms by the city clerk.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Contents of a lobbyist’s statement of registration.
